metadata.synopsis: One-liner for Bhaal cultist in the sewers. Reacts to whether or not you are allied with Orin.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Make sure you have an agreement with Orin (it is not currently implemented) and go to -25; 22; 806 and click on Night Blade - S_LOW_Bhaalist04 - 42bbff34-15a2-4802-a6de-262ef040aa9f

0.speaker: Night Blade Phylle
0.text: Such slaughter. Such annihilation. The Murder Lord's thirst is well-quenched today.
0.context: NodeContext: 'A meek one' refers to the player having snuck up to this cultist

1.speaker: Night Blade Phylle
1.text: Your service is welcome here, favoured of Orin, for there is no end to the Murder Lord's thirst.
1.context: NodeContext: 'A meek one' refers to the player having snuck up to this cultist

2.speaker: Night Blade Phylle
2.text: What's this? A meek one, ready for the slaughter. In Bhaal's name.
2.context: NodeContext: 'A meek one' refers to the player having snuck up to this cultist

3.speaker: Night Blade Phylle
3.text: There is butchery aplenty for all of Bhaal's servants.
